Download Your Free Report from Pivotal Labs <http://play.gopivotal.com/rs/pivotal/images/PL-Whitepaper-Health-A-New-Prescription-for-Mobile-Health-Q313.pdf>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your interest in the report "A New Prescription for Mobile Health" by Pivotal Labs.
Please click here to access the paper <http://play.gopivotal.com/rs/pivotal/images/PL-Whitepaper-Health-A-New-Prescription-for-Mobile-Health-Q313.pdf>.
If you have any questions, reply to this email and we'll respond right away.
Sincerely, Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
